name: online multi-language dictionary
short_description:
In this dictionary if a bilingual person add a world in his two known languages that word will be mapped to all other languages knowing the meaning of that word. This is very natural, if I know meaning of boy in french (lets take it boyf) and I come to know what we say boy  in Jermen(lets take it boyj), then I can say that boyj in Jerman is boyf in french. 

so if you already have rules:

boy(English) == boyf(French)
boy(English)==boyh(Hindi)
boyf(French)==boyj(Jermen)

then we can say 

boyf(French) == boyh(Hindi)
boyj(Jermen) == boy(English)

and now someone enters a rule for new Indian language tamil.

boyt(tamil)==boyh(hindi)

now boyt(tamil) can be translated to new rules:

boyt(tamil)==boyh(hindi)==boy(English)==boyf(french)==boryj(jermen).

So, we can translate any language to any other known language if we know the meaning of world in one language only. This is the funda of this dictionary
summary: This is an open source intitiative to make a multilangauge dictionary.
